title: 我的世界十大金曲！！！
author: wangdong
txt_content:
我的世界十大金曲里有一个什么要做一个蛋糕的歌曲
歌词我知道一点：
There is a zombie on my side by my side, the situation is out of control because didn't tell meTell me这个就是十大金曲的网址
大家去听一听 ！！！！歌曲的具体位置在视频的12分左右！！！：亲，请帮助一下我吧！！！
：帮他一下吧亲！！！
：就是嘛，他很可怜的！！！
：咦！谢谢你们啊！！！
有听过这首歌的请帮忙一下哈！！！：对！谁帮忙我给他32个赞！！！
：谢谢大家！！帮忙一下哦！！

replies.author: castlesean
replies.txt_content:
My health goes down
I need a cow
I'll find some wheat
And one egg now
This sweet, sweet, treat
All I need is sugar cane
I'll make some cake cake cake cake (后三个“cake”越来越小)
一段音乐
That zombie fell on me, fell on me
Just outta'（out of） nowhere no one tellin' me, tellin' me.
Caught off guard with no weaponry, weaponry
I'll stumble off until he can't see me, can't see me

Put a torch up now 
Now I'm building with my hands
Make a table out of planks
I'm craftin' if I can
I only have a little time
I don't have time to waste
Wastin' away so wait
What to craft what to make

THINK I'LL MAKE SOME CAKE

My health goes down
I need a cow
I'll find some wheat
And one egg now
This sweet, sweet, treat
All I need is sugar cane

I'll make some cake 
I'll make some cake

一段音乐（其中有一个“I’ll make some cake”）

C-A-K-E spell for me, spell for me
This cake's so good it tastes so well to me, well to me
It makes me stronger I get well quickly, well quickly
Kill that zombie just like 1 2 3, 1 2 3


Pull my sword out now 
Now I'm feelin' like a man
I'll have another piece
I wish I could eat ten
Run out of my cave fire
The fire to kill some mobs
I'll show that zombie who's boss
Then I'll eat his poison steak

WITH THE REST OF MY CAKE

My health goes down
I need a cow
I'll find some wheat
And one egg now
This sweet, sweet, treat
All I need is sugar cane
I'll make some cake
I'll make some cake

一段音乐（一个“I’ll make some cake”）

一段音乐（音乐中“I'll make some cake！I'll make some cake（三遍小声）I'll make some cake！
I'll make some cake（三遍小声）I'll make some cake！）

My health goes down
I need a cow
I'll find some wheat
And one egg now
This sweet, sweet, treat
All I need is sugar cane
I'll make some cake
I'll make some cake


完

replies.author: YZC
replies.txt_content: 你在干嘛，是要作死么，错版了喂

replies.author: castlesean
replies.txt_content: 我花了一上午判断歌词！结果网上有（不过和我一样）

replies.author: castlesean
replies.txt_content: 我在网上的加了些内容，因为网上的不全，所以又补充了一下。

replies.author: castlesean
replies.txt_content:
castlesean 发表于 2014-4-5 13:16
My health goes down
 I need a cow
 I'll find some wheat
对不起，是Run out of my cave with fire
